<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
InvalidTypeCycle occurs when a cycle in type definitions results in a
type that is not well-defined.

Example:
 import "unsafe"

 type T [unsafe.Sizeof(T{})]int
```
